subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s soccer team said goodbye on Wednesday night to Coach Pia Sundhage, who departs with a 91-6-10 record and two Olympic gold medals.
snippet: The United States women’s soccer team said goodbye on Wednesday night to Coach Pia Sundhage, who departs with a 91-6-10 record and two Olympic gold medals.
